Index

Decks

UI components for dealing with the collections of items.

Getting started

git clone {clone URL}
cd decks
npm install

# Default build for development (file watcher)
gulp

# Build and run the tests
gulp test

# Build and run the examples site
gulp example

Inspirations

  • Tremula
  • Stapel
  • gridster.js
  • jquery.shapeshift
  • jQuery Nested
  • Free Wall
  • Shuffle
  • Loading Effects for Grid Items
  • Magnet
  • jQuery Gridly
